products.name: 6 Cup Juice Dispenser Multi Color Made in China
products.sort_details:
6-Cup Juice Dispenser in Multiple Colors
Practical and Space-Saving Design: This dispenser features a design that combines dispensing functionality with portability and storage, saving countertop space compared to storing multiple separate juice bottles or cartons.
Perfect 6-Cup Capacity: This dispenser offers 6 built-in slots or cups for dispensing juice or other beverages. This capacity is ideal for small gatherings, families, or even everyday use.
Various and Fun Colors: The dispenser and its accompanying cups are available in a variety of bright and fun colors. This adds a lively and fun touch to your table and makes serving beverages more attractive.
Featuring a simple design, the dispenser is easy to fill with juice or other beverages, and the built-in or separate cups are easy to hold and drink from.
Durable and Safe Material: Typically made of food-grade plastic, it is durable and withstands repeated use and is easy to clean.
This dispenser is a great choice for serving beverages at parties, picnics, family gatherings, or even for everyday use, making serving juice to children easier and more organized.

recommended_products.name: Hygienic Laundry Bleach 500gm Hygiene White with Oxygen Formula for Cleaning Clothes Dr. Beckmann Made in Poland
recommended_products.sort_details:
Brand Name	Dr. Beckmann
Item Form	Powder
Unit Count	500 gram
Material Type Free	Chlorine Free
Material Features	Oxygen-Based
Number of Items	1
Formulation Type	High Efficiency
Dr. Beckmann Hygiene White combines the best characteristics of hygiene and whiteningpower with each other.
For this the laundry will already become hygienically clean and brilliantly white at low temperatures.
Removes unpleasant odours and provides freshness.Fights greying and yellowing.
For white clothes, the hygiene requirements are usually very high. However, frequent washing of textiles at low temperatures can lead to unpleasant odours and the clothes not being completely clean. The laundry also loses its bright white appearance or starts to acquire an ugly yellow tint. Dr. Beckmann Hygiene White combines the best cleaning properties with bleaching power. Therefore, your laundry will be hygienically clean and bright white at low temperatures.



Instructions for use



Can be used with all types of washing powders and main wash cycles. For all temperatures starting from 30 °C. Suitable for all types of white fabrics/white fabrics containing colours except wool and silk. For use in the washing machine: Add 50 g (about 3 tablespoons) of Dr. Beckmann Hygiene Bleach to the washing powder in the detergent dispenser drawer of the washing machine. If the laundry is very dirty, add 75 g. If using a washing liquid, add the liquid with the dosing cap to the inside of the washing machine (drum) and add the Hygiene Bleach in the detergent dispenser drawer. To soak: Add 50g (about 3 tablespoons) of Dr. Beckmann Healthy Bleach to 4 litres of hot water. Make sure the fabric is completely submerged and leave for a maximum of 1 hour. Then rinse thoroughly or wash as usual.

Substance note

Do not apply powder directly to fabrics. Please observe the care label on the garment. Close tightly after use and store in a cool, dry place. Not suitable for removing stains from sunscreens and tanning products

Environmental information

Healthy Bleach is environmentally friendly and does not harm lakes or rivers.
Contains no phosphates, chlorine or boron. Active oxygen decomposes completely


WARNING!

Causes serious eye damage. Keep out of reach of children. In case of eye contact: Rinse carefully with water for several minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present and easily accessible. If eye irritation persists: Seek medical advice/attention.




Ingredients: 15% or more, less than 30% oxygen-based bleaching agents. Optical brighteners, fragrances.
